feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2024-02-06T17:59:33.446293Z; ; ; <作者>; <名称>;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;更好地调用 GPT，将大型语言模型与律师进行比较 [pdf]</stitle>; <id>;https://arxiv.org/abs/2401.16212</id>; <updated>;2024 -02-06T15:57:32.993425Z</更新>; <link href="https://arxiv.org/abs/2401.16212"/>; <作者>; <name>;vinnyglennon</name>; <uri>;https:// news.ycombinator.com/user?id=vinnyglennon</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://arxiv.org/static/browse/0.3.4/images/ arxiv-logo-fb.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：129px；" />;<br />;本文对大型语言模型与传统法律合同审查员、初级律师和法律流程外包商进行了开创性的比较。我们剖析了法学硕士在合同审查过程中是否能够在准确性、速度和成本效率方面超越人类。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#better-call-gpt-comparing-large-language-models-against-lawyers-pdf" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; < a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39274918" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;在您的 OpenWrt 盒子上运行：AdGuard Home 可在全网络范围内拦截广告和跟踪</stitle>; [摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39276687" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <条目 xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;命令行界面指南</stitle>; <id>;https://clig.dev/</ id>; <更新>;2024-02-06T13:57:32.996155Z</更新>; <link href="https://clig.dev/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;petercooper</名称>; <uri>;https ://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=petercooper</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://clig.dev/CLIG-social-card.jpg “样式=”宽度：220px;高度：116px;“ />;<br />;开源指南可帮助您编写更好的命令行程序，采用传统的 UNIX 原则并针对现代进行更新。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#command-line-interface-guidelines" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator. com/item?id=39273932" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml" >; <title type="text">;Bluesky 和 ​​at 协议</stitle>; <id>;https://arxiv.org/abs/2402.03239</id>; <更新>;2024-02-06T15:57:32.996673Z< /updated>; <link href="https://arxiv.org/abs/2402.03239"/>; <作者>; <name>;lawgimenez</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id= lawgimenez</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://arxiv.org/static/browse/0.3.4/images/arxiv-logo-fb.png" style= “宽度：220 像素；高度：129 像素；” />;<br />;Bluesky 是一个基于 AT 协议构建的新社交网络，AT 协议是公共社交媒体的去中心化基础。它于 2023 年 2 月推出内测版，并在次年增长到超过 300 万注册用户。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#bluesky-and-the-at-protocol" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=39275203" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;NetBox.dev：网络上所有内容的真实来源</stitle>; <id>;https://netbox.dev/</id>; <更新>;2024-02- 06T13:57:32.997161Z</updated>; <link href="https://netbox.dev/"/>; <作者>; <name>;dpcx</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/ user?id=dpcx</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;修复了各种问题，包括验证错误、数据损坏和渲染问题。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#netbox-dev-the-source-of-truth-for-everything-on-your-network" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a >; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39274125" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Web Monetization API 发生了什么？</stitle>; <id>;https://chriscoyier.net/2024/01/ 24/what-happened-with-the-web-monetization-api/</id>; <更新>;2024-02-06T14:57:32.997646Z</更新>; <link href="https://chriscoyier.net/ 2024/01/24/what-happened-with-the-web-monetization-api/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;kuba-orlik</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user ?id=kuba-orlik</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://i0.wp.com/chriscoyier.net/wp-content/uploads/2024/01 /958shots_so.png?resize=1024%2C768&ssl=1" style="宽度：220px；高度：165px；" />;<br />;Coil 是推动 Web Monetization API 的主要初创公司，但失败了。 Interledger基金会现在将管理Interledger的未来发展。 Web Monetization API 旨在实现网络上流畅、快速的资金转移，并具有删除广告等用例。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#what-happened-with-the-web-monetization-api" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39274455" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;助长野火的不正当政策</stitle>; <id>;https://www.newyorker.com/magazine/2024/02/05/the-perverse-政策-that-fuel-wildfires</id>; <更新>;2024-02-06T16:57:32.998147Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.newyorker.com/magazine/2024/02/05 /the-perverse-policies-that-fuel-wildfires"/>; <作者>; <名称>;PaulHoule</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=PaulHoule</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://media.newyorker.com/photos/65b138cadee6129fbd8766f3/1:1/w_2560%2Cc_limit/240205_r43722.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度： 220 像素；” />;<br />;加拿大在 2023 年经历了有记录以来最严重的野火季节，烧毁面积近 4600 万英亩，是之前记录的三倍。野火的频率和严重程度不断增加是由于气候变化和控制燃烧的抑制。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-perverse-policies-that-fuel-wildfires" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39276452" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;我们可能希望定期跟踪每个服务器的重要性</stitle>; <id>;https://utcc.utoronto.ca/~cks/space/blog/ sysadmin/TrackingMachineImportance</id>; <更新>;2024-02-06T11:57:32.999093Z</更新>; <link href="https://utcc.utoronto.ca/~cks/space/blog/sysadmin/TrackingMachineImportance" />; <author>; <name>;pabs3</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=pabs3</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;你不&# 39；没有权限访问此服务器上的 /~cks/space/blog/sysadmin/TrackingMachineImportance。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#we-might-want-to-regularly-keep-track-of-how-important-each-server-is" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39272952" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml :base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;给未来的自己写一封信</stitle>; <id>;https://www.futureme.org /</id>; <更新>;2024-02-06T13:57:32.999585Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.futureme.org/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;skanderbm </名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=skanderbm</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://prod-assets.futureme. org/assets/upsells/app-store-badge-16cbc82dd01b00c5bbd594304588b13b4f74aa3871bc04db8a73652efa507d21.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：74px；" />;<br />;给未来写一封信可能是一种强有力的体验。以下是未来写信的一些想法：反思 Covid-19 大流行、展望 5 年后的生活、写信给您的孩子或未来的配偶/伴侣，以及解决 2030 年的气候变化目标。<a href="https ://hackernews.betacat.io/#write-a-letter-to-your-future-self" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator. com/item?id=39274004" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml" >; <title type="text">;“左高而干”：一位下岗的游戏行业工人的自白</stitle>; <id>;https://digiday.com/marketing/left-high-and-dry- confesses-of-a-laid-off-gaming-industry-worker/</id>; <更新>;2024-02-06T17:00:33.001077Z</更新>; <link href="https://digiday.com/ marketing/left-high-and-dry-confessions-of-a-laid-off-gaming-industry-worker/"/>; <author>; <name>;jarsin</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator .com/user?id=jarsin</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://digiday.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/3/2024/02 /football-revenue-digiday.gif?w=160&h=100&crop=1" style="宽度：220px; height: 138px;" />;<br />;在科技和媒体领域，裁员季正如火如荼地进行，而游戏行业目前受到的打击尤其严重。游戏公司正在努力利用免费游戏兴起的机会- 游戏或实时服务游戏成为行业领先的商业模式，导致其工资大幅削减。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#left-high-and-dry-confessions-of-a -laid-off-gaming-industry-worker" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39276891" target="_blank" >;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;领导力神话</stitle>; <id>;https://aeon.co/essays/who-are-the-leaders-in-our-heads-and-how-did-they-get-there</id>; <更新>;2024 -02-06T14:57:33.001570Z</更新>; <link href="https://aeon.co/essays/who-are-the-leaders-in-our-heads-and-how-did-they- get-there"/>; <author>; <name>;pepys</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=pepys</uri>; </author>; <content type="html" >;<img src="https://images.aeonmedia.co/images/af2af1a3-a22f-4c0c-9970-4a347d8309ae/essay-morgan-david-bathsheba-158530v_0083.jpg?width=3840&quality=75&format=auto" style= “宽度：220px； height: 138px;" />;<br />;本文探讨了领导力的神话，以及它如何促进个人主义的世界观。它讨论了圣经对我们理解领导力的影响，并介绍了大卫王的故事领导力的局限性和后果的示例。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-mythos-of-leadership" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href= "https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39248331" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews .betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;相对论宇宙飞船</stitle>; <id>;https://dmytry.github.io/space/</id>; <更新>;2024-02- 05T20:57:33.002046Z</updated>; <link href="https://dmytry.github.io/space/"/>; <作者>; <name>;thunderbong</name>; <uri>;https://news. ycombinator.com/user?id=thunderbong</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">; <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#relativistic-spaceship" target="_blank" >;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39266396" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;2023 年维苏威火山挑战赛大奖颁发：我们可以阅读第一个卷轴</stitle>; <id>; https://scrollprize.org/grandprize</id>; <更新>;2024-02-05T17:57:33.002994Z</更新>; <link href="https://scrollprize.org/grandprize"/>; <作者>; <name>;amrrs</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=amrrs</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https:// /scrollprize.org/img/grandprize/scroll-1-scale.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 147px;" />;<br />;2023年维苏威挑战赛大奖得主已经揭晓。275年后，被火山喷发掩埋的卷轴终于可以被阅读了。<a href="https://hackernews .betacat.io/#vesuvius-challenge-2023-grand-prize-awarded-we-can-read-the-first-scroll" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39261861" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;卫星巨型星座会削弱地球磁场吗？</stitle>; <id>;https://spaceweatherarchive.com/2024/02/01/will-satellite-megaconstellations- weak-earths-magnet-field/</id>; <更新>;2024-02-06T10:57:33.004965Z</更新>; <link href="https://spaceweatherarchive.com/2024/02/01/will- Satellite-megaconstellations-weaken-earths-Magnetic-field/"/>; <author>; <name>;altacc</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=altacc</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://spaceweatherarchive.files.wordpress.com/2024/02/figure1_crop.jpg?w=560" style="width: 220px;高度：157px;" />;<br />;自 2020 年以来，在 SpaceX 等公司的推动下，地球轨道上的卫星数量增加了一倍多。然而，一项新的研究表明，由于导电碎片，巨型卫星星座可能会削弱地球磁场它们在脱离轨道时产生。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#will-satellite-megaconstellations-weaken-earth-s-tropic-field" target="_blank">;[summary]</ a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39272884" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base= "https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;展示 HN：Atopile – 使用代码设计电路板</stitle>; <id>;https://news.ycombinator.com /item?id=39263854</id>; <更新>;2024-02-05T17:57:33.005461Z</更新>; <link href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39263854"/>; <author>; <name>;Timot05</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Timot05</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;Atopile 是一个开放-用代码描述电路的源语言和工具链。它旨在通过提供一种描述所需内容、重用现有设计并将描述编译到产品中的方法来解决硬件设计的难题。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-atopile-design-circle-boards-with-code" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39263854" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;显示 HN：命名那个国家</stitle>; <id>;https://www.namethatnation.com/</id>; <更新>;2024-02 -06T11:57:33.005973Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.namethatnation.com/"/>; <作者>; <name>;andrewtbham</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator .com/user?id=andrewtbham</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;命名那个国家：地理问答游戏 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn -name-that-nation" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39268439" target="_blank">;[评论] </a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;PostgreSQL 就足够了</stitle>; < id>;https://gist.github.com/cpursley/c8fb81fe8a7e5df038158bdfe0f06dbb</id>; <更新>;2024-02-06T13:57:33.006916Z</更新>; <link href="https://gist.github.com /cpursley/c8fb81fe8a7e5df038158bdfe0f06dbb"/>; <作者>; <名称>;cpursley</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=cpursley</uri>; </author>; <content type="html ">;<iframe src="https://gist.github.com/cpursley/c8fb81fe8a7e5df038158bdfe0f06dbb.pibb" style="宽度：100%;高度：250 像素；边框：0;">;</iframe>; <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#postgresql-is-enough" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39273954" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;海洋可能已经变暖 1.7°C</stitle>; <id>;https://eos.org/articles/oceans-may-have-已经看到-1-7c-of-warming</id>; <更新>;2024-02-06T15:57:33.007846Z</更新>; <link href="https://eos.org/articles/oceans-may -have-already-seen-1-7c-of-warming"/>; <作者>; <名称>;Brajeshwar</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Brajeshwar</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://i0.wp.com/eos.org/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/icads-measurements.gif?resize=780 %2C509&ssl=1" style="宽度: 220px;高度：144px;" />;<br />;来自加勒比海的海绵保留了数百年前的海洋温度记录。这些新揭示的古气候记录表明，由于工业时代化石燃料的燃烧，海洋表面温度（SST）开始上升1860 年左右。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#oceans-may-have-already-seen-1-7degc-of-warming" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39275272" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https ://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Bluesky 注册现已向公众开放</stitle>; <id>;https://bsky.social/about/blog/02 -06-2024-join-bluesky</id>; <更新>;2024-02-06T15:57:33.008336Z</更新>; <link href="https://bsky.social/about/blog/02-06- 2024-join-bluesky"/>; <author>; <name>;jakebsky</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jakebsky</uri>; </author>; <content type=" html">;<img src="https://bsky.social/about/images/social-card-default-gradient.png" style="width: 220px; height: 116px;" />;<br />;Bluesky 正在构建一个开放的社交网络，任何人都可以做出贡献，同时仍然为用户提供易于使用的体验。他们已准备好让任何人加入，并一直致力于以下功能：让用户掌控自己的社交媒体体验。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#bluesky-signups-are-now-open-to-the-public" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39274882" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml :base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;JDK 21 的 JVM 性能比较</stitle>; <id>;https://ionutbalosin.com/2024/ 02/jvm-performance-comparison-for-jdk-21/</id>; <更新>;2024-02-06T05:57:33.008809Z</更新>; <link href="https://ionutbalosin.com/2024/ 02/jvm-performance-comparison-for-jdk-21/"/>; <作者>; <name>;mfiguiere</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=mfiguiere</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://ionutbalosin.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/revenue-operations-collage.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 126px;" />;<br />;本文介绍了一系列针对顶级 JIT 编译器的 Java 虚拟机 (JVM) 基准测试。这些基准测试分为编译器、API 和杂项。结果显示了性能差异JIT 编译器之间的优化策略。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#jvm-performance-comparison-for-jdk-21" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; < a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39271107" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;并发进程及其语法 (1979) [pdf]</stitle>;
